name: Thomas H. Cormen
biography: Alan Turing was a British mathematician and logician who made significant contributions to the development of theoretical computer science.

name: Robert C. Martin
biography: Grace Hopper was an American computer scientist and United States Navy rear admiral. She was a pioneer in developing computer technology, helping to create UNIVAC I, the first commercial electronic computer, and inventing one of the first compiler related tools.

name: Erich Gamma
biography: Ada Lovelace was an English mathematician and writer, chiefly known for her work on Charles Babbage's proposed mechanical general-purpose computer, the Analytical Engine. She is often regarded as the first computer programmer.
